name: 7DayYogaChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open my yoga class”
”Alexa, start my yoga class”
”Alexa, launch my yoga class”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my yoga class
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Yoga Download’s Alexa friendly 7-Day Yoga Challenge is your free introduction to online yoga from YogaDownload.com, one of the world’s top yoga content creators and communities. 

 

Through this 7-day yoga challenge on Alexa you will experience a 20-30 minute easy-to-follow relaxing audio yoga class every day for seven days (or any day you choose), with classes from top-rated instructors including Jackie Casal Mahrou, Elise Fabricant, Cher Aslor, Lisa Richards, and Nancy Nielsen.

 

The top-rated classes included in this challenge are: “Gentle Hatha Yoga,” “Lunar Flow,” “Gentle and Sweet Flow,” “Rise and Shine,” “Gentle Hatha Yoga 3,” “Forrest Yoga,” and “Lunchtime Yoga Reset:”

 

The 7-Day Yoga Challenge is perfect for those newer to yoga, and is also a fantastic relaxing experience for the more experienced practitioner. This is an ideal way to stretch, gain flexibility, and relax, and is a perfect introduction to the wealth of amazing yoga content on YogaDownload.com.

 

All the classes are super easy to follow and are designed specifically to work on audio-only devices (as well as video-capable devices).

 

As a bonus - you’ll get a special discount for YogaDownload.com after completing the course so that you can gain access to 1,600+ downloadable yoga classes on your iPhone, Android, Roku, iPad and of course the YogaDownload website!

 

With the Alexa-friendly 7 Day Yoga Challenge you’ll feel happier, healthier, more flexible and more toned – for FREE!

 

FUNCTIONS 

Say "Start My Yoga Class" 

Use your voice to pause, play, and/or skip to the next class.

Say “stop” to end a session.

The 7 yoga classes are arranged in a daily sequence, but you can feel free to take each one whenever you want.

A reminder can be created to send a message to your Alexa-enabled device to notify you that it’s time to start your next yoga class.

 

Please note: you will not be able to use your voice to adjust the volume while using this skill, so you will need to do so directly on your Alexa device.

 

REVIEWS AND FEEDBACK:

We would love to hear from you! Your reviews and feedback are important to us. If you love our Alexa-friendly 7-Day Yoga Challenge please consider writing a review and also providing your feedback. Also, don’t forget to let us know what you would like to experience next on our Alexa app
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
